subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Candice Wiggins scored 21 of her 35 points in the first half Sunday for fifth-ranked Stanford, which handed No. 10 Baylor its first loss of the season with a physical 87-63 victory at home.
